page.title: 05The Drinks Wholesaler (1)
page.content: I visited Reihill-Mc Keowns on Friday 31st May 1985. The full name of the business is{Reihill-Mc Keown Ltd.} It was established in Irvinestown in 1928. The two firms amalgamated in 1973. They deliver beers, spirits, minerals etc. They employ 15 there. There are 4 working in the office, 8 drivers, 2 garage-men and 1 foreman. There are no plans for expansion in the business at the moment. While I was there I saw the warehouse where they keep all the minerals, spirits etc. They have a special part of the warehouse centrally heated to keep{Guinness.}In the winter the Guinness must be kept warm so that it wouldn't go sour. I saw the fork-lift which could lift many crates high.
